name: Unroll It
description:
Unroll the ball throughout 80 levels. Unroll it is a very simple and addictive puzzle game. Take the ball from one point to another making the lowest possible amount of moves. Get a High Score in every level and then try and beat your friend’s records. Unroll it challenges your puzzle solving skills. What are you waiting for? Download Unroll it and start solving puzzles now!

Features:

- Lots of puzzles for you to solve.
- 4 different scenarios.
- Classic esthetics.
- Records display.
